author: admin
title: AAI Recruitment 2017 aai.aero (Junior Assistant – 147 Jobs) Apply Online
text: Must Check: Written Exam Techniques Process To Apply for AAI Jobs : First of all, eligible candidates must have to visit the official website of Airport Authority of India that is www.airportsindia.org.in On the home page, press on “Careers” tab which is given at the bottom of the page. Now hit on “Recruitment” link and a list of latest job openings will be appeared on your screen. Candidates need to hit on “RECRUITMENT NOTICE -2017 for filling up the post of Junior Assistant (Fire Service)/ NE(4 at various airports in the above states in Southern Region” link. Read the complete information from the opened notification and download the application form in prescribed format. Fill the complete details in application form in accurate manner. Paste your latest passport size photograph in the given space and attach the Self Attested photocopies of Certificates with filled application form. Enclose it in an envelope should be super scripted by “Application for the post of Junior Assistant (Fire Service). At last, send this complete application to the below mentioned address latest by last date. Postal Address :
